string.name: app_inst_text
string.p:
Welcome to the Bad Date App!
 Looks like your in need of a fake emergency.
 After clicking "Get Started" you will be taken to the Create Your Settings page. Here you can enter the contact name you wish to appear as well as the message you want to show as the notification.
 You will then select the time of day you need a fake text sent. 
That's it!
 Clicking "Done" will send you to the summary screen where you will see your countdown timer and the message info you can expect.
 If you feel like you just aren't sure about this date yet, you can add 15 minutes by clicking the "extend" button at any time.
 If you end up having a great time just click the "Cancel" button to deactivate your fake emergency.
 Good luck!! We hope you have a great time!
